name: Cyber Russia
storyline:
When the player first enters the server, he finds himself in a small village called Murovnka. There he is met by a character named Timofey Lavrov, who becomes his guide and assistant in mastering the game. Timofey tells the player about the mechanics of the game, gives survival tips and helps him get out of the village and into the big city.

Each faction in the game has its own guide, similar to Timofey Lavrov. These characters play an important role in orienting newcomers and helping them understand the complex structure of the CyberRussia world. Thanks to the guides, players can more quickly adapt and find their place in different factions, avoiding loss and temporary difficulties in the process of mastering the game environment.
summary:
Welcome to the gritty world of CyberRussia, an online game set in a futuristic, cyberpunk version of Russia where players navigate through a complex web of crime, corruption, and power. In this virtual world, players can choose diverse roles such as law enforcement officers tasked with upholding order, prosecutors fighting against corruption, judges arbitrating cases, ambitious deputies shaping policies, and governors wielding influence over regions.

However, the allure of the dark side is equally tempting. You can venture into the underworld, joining criminal syndicates to become a notorious bandit or mastermind. Engage in illicit activities, from bribery to smuggling, but beware—the watchful eye of the federal security service is always present, ready to pounce on any misstep.

For those seeking alternative paths, there's a chance to invest in land, cultivate crops, and engage in trade, all within the cybernetic landscapes of future Russia. Become a miner, extracting precious resources, or rise as an influential entrepreneur amidst the neon-lit chaos of this immersive, cyberpunk universe. The choices are yours to make, but the consequences are as real as the digital world around you.
